name: Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds - Clone Campaigns
name_original: Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds - Clone Campaigns
description:
Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds - Clone Campaigns is a strategy game developed by LucasArts Entertainment. It came out on 01-05-2002. It was published by LucasArts Entertainment. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds - Clone Campaigns is available on PC.
